input_data.title: Find Me in Paris
input_data.overview: When Lena Grisky, a Russian Princess and student at the Paris Opera Ballet School accidentally time travels to present day, she must quickly adapt if she hopes to keep her secret and hide from the dangerous Time Collectors.

response.analytical_summary: Find Me in Paris is a drama series blending elements of science fiction and fantasy, centered on a young woman displaced from her own time. The series explores themes of identity, belonging, and adaptation as the protagonist navigates a new world while concealing her origins. It offers a blend of mystery and emotional depth, appealing to audiences interested in time-travel narratives and character-driven stories. The series balances the intrigue of a hidden secret with the challenges of personal growth and the search for connection.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with Lena Grisky, a Russian princess studying at the Paris Opera Ballet School, unexpectedly transported from her own time to the present day. Disoriented and alone, she must quickly learn to navigate a world vastly different from her own, all while concealing her true identity and origin from those around her. She finds temporary refuge with Jeff and his mother, Carolyn, who are unaware of her secret. As Lena attempts to blend in, she encounters various challenges, including the Time Collectors, who seek to recapture her and maintain the integrity of the timeline. Throughout the series, Lena develops relationships with those around her, experiencing the complexities of friendship and potential romance. The narrative follows her attempts to understand her time travel, uncover the reasons behind it, and ultimately, decide whether to return to her own time or embrace her new life in the present. The series explores the consequences of altering the timeline and the emotional toll of living a double life, culminating in a confrontation with the Time Collectors and a pivotal decision about Lena's future.
response.keyword_sentence: Find Me in Paris is a young-adult drama series blending science fiction and fantasy as a displaced princess navigates a new life in modern-day Paris while concealing her time-traveling secret.
